title: Review: In ‘Only Gold,’ Each Move Is Worth 1,000 Words
description: The new Kate Nash dance musical, choreographed by Andy Blankenbuehler, is spectacular as long as you pay no attention to what it’s saying.
dc:creator: Jesse Green

media:content.media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Karine Plantadit, center, as a queen with spectacular grace on the dance floor, with, from left, Ida Saki, Katie Webber, Morgan Marcell and Haley Fish, in the musical “Only Gold” at MCC Theater in Manhattan.
